translations: v．被挖角：指某人因其专业技能或经验而被其他公司或组织主动邀请加入。
· He was headhunted by a rival company.
他被一家竞争对手公司挖角。

sentences.sentence: I was headhunted by a marketing agency.
sentences.translation: 我被一家销售代理公司物色上了。

sentences.sentence: He was headhunted by Barkers last October to build an advertising team.
sentences.translation: 他去年10月被巴克斯挖去组建一个广告团队。

sentences.sentence: He was headhunted from a rival company.
sentences.translation: 他是从一家竞争的公司挖过来的。
